page.title: 16EDUCATION
page.content: {SCHOOL.} I LIKE SCHOOL BECAUSE THE TEACHERS DON'T ONLY GIVE YOU WORK OUT OF BOOKS BUT THEY DISCUSS THINGS WITH YOU AND WE ALSO HAVE PROJECTS TO DO.THE ONLY THING I DISLIKE ABOUT SCHOOL IS HAVING EXAMS BECAUSE THEY MAKE ME NERVOUS. ONE OF THE THINGS I LOOK FORWARD TO IS MUSIC LESSONS ON TUESDAYS AND FRIDAYS WHEN WE HAVE RECORDER,PERCUSSION AND VIOLIN LESSONS - THIS IS GREAT FUN.THE OTHER THINGS I LIKE IS P.E. WHEN WE PLAY NETBALL OR ROUNDERS. {SOME STATISTICS OF SCHOOLCHILDREN.} AV.AGE HEIGHT WEIGHT SHOE HANDSPAN 8.5YRS 124CM 28KG 33EUR 16.5CM 9.2YRS 128CM 30KG 35EUR 17CM 10.8YRS 131CM 34KG 36EUR 17.5CM 11.3YRS 139CM 37KG 37EUR 18.1CM {THE ABOVE IS THE AVERAGE SIZES OF {CHILDREN AT BLAENGWRACH PRIMARY SCHOOL {WEST GLAMORGAN.
